From walking through freshly prepared fields to engaging in candid conversations with our farmer, the visit highlighted what drives us every day â€“ creating a complete ecosystem that supports farmers at every step. Our team shared insights about how we're building a 360-degree support system, from land preparation to providing quality agricultural inputs to securing the best market prices for produce.

It was an inspiring day filled with meaningful interactions with farmers and our Implement Manager. Weâ€™re grateful for the opportunity to share our work and learn together. Here's to continuing our mission of closing the farming loop and creating lasting impact where it matters most - in our farmers' lives!

Dr. Nilay Pandey Vivek Kumar Saurav Singh PRINCE PANDEY Sunidhi Kumari Gerald Weigl ChloÃ© Morenne

At Agrix, we channel data to optimize and regulate demand-based farm machinery, enhancing deployment efficiency. Additionally, we manage inventory according to farmers' needs, ensuring they have access to essential resources.

Our vision is to transform rural infrastructure with proper technology. Farming, a cornerstone of the Indian economy, still requires the technological support it deserves. It's time to change that.

Looking ahead, we see Agrix not just as an agriculture company but as a tech-driven organization shaping the future of farming through the Agrix Data Pool. Our mission is clear: ğ—™ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ˜€ğ—µğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¹ğ—± ğ—¯ğ—² ğ—® ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ—½ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ˜€ ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—³ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—». The future of agriculture lies in digital transformation for farmers. Agrix is here to lead the way.

In Bihar, farmers usually follow two main cropping seasons: Rabi & Kharif. However, ğ˜¸ğ˜©ğ˜¢ğ˜µ ğ˜ªğ˜§ ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜º ğ˜¤ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜­ğ˜¥ ğ˜¨ğ˜³ğ˜°ğ˜¸ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜¢ğ˜¥ğ˜¥ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜¤ğ˜³ğ˜°ğ˜±ğ˜±ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜´ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜´ğ˜°ğ˜¯?

Agrix is making this possible. We have introduced a new cropping season, especially for crops like moong. This allows farmers to take advantage of a third season called Zaid, which was not used much before. This leads to better efficiency and higher realization.

ğ˜ğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜´ ğ˜¤ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜¨ğ˜¦ğ˜µ ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜¦ ğ˜§ğ˜¶ğ˜­ğ˜­ ğ˜±ğ˜³ğ˜°ğ˜¥ğ˜¶ğ˜¤ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜·ğ˜¦ ğ˜´ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜´ğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜´ ğ˜¸ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜© ğ˜ˆğ˜¨ğ˜³ğ˜ªğ˜¹â€™ğ˜´ ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜­ğ˜º ğ˜®ğ˜¢ğ˜¤ğ˜©ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¦ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜±ğ˜¶ğ˜µ ğ˜¢ğ˜·ğ˜¢ğ˜ªğ˜­ğ˜¢ğ˜£ğ˜ªğ˜­ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜º, ğ˜®ğ˜¢ğ˜¹ğ˜ªğ˜®ğ˜ªğ˜»ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜­ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜±ğ˜°ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¯ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜¨ğ˜¦ğ˜µğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ , 30-40% ğ˜£ğ˜¦ğ˜µğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜³ ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜ªğ˜»ğ˜¢ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜°ğ˜¯. Rural communities are now empowered with new opportunities for sustainable growth and long-term success.
Thank you, Prof Dhruv Nath, for graciously mentioning Agrix and our vision. We truly appreciate your support and recognition!

At Agrix, we are bridging the gap between tradition and innovation.
Our team at Agrix is working across multiple locations, bringing modernÂ  farm machinery to small and marginal farmers. Our tractors, harvesters, and other machines are in there full operation.
The machines are empowered by live tracking technology that enables real-time monitoring, optimized resource allocation, and data-driven decision making.
Our team works tirelessly, often in challenging conditions like 42Â°C heat, to ensure that every farmer has the machine and expertise they need to succeed.

Transforming Agriculture Through Farm Mechanization

We are excited to share our significant progress in agricultural mechanization! This year, weâ€™ve achieved a remarkable 50-55% increase in farm mechanization and expanded our geographical reach by 40% compared to last year.

Our initiatives have not only broadened our impact across Bihar but have also strengthened our connection with marginal and small farmers.

Real change occurs when technology meets trust and innovation meets empathy. Together, we are paving the way for a more sustainable and inclusive agricultural future.

ğŸšœâœ¨ Happy to be part of a mission that aims to mechanize small and marginal farmers !

By empowering them with modern technology, we can enhance productivity, promote sustainability, and uplift communities.

Together, letâ€™s transform agriculture and create a brighter future for all!
North India is facing climate change this year. As we move toward the Kharif season, especially for paddy cultivation, do you think the monsoon will support farmers this time?

ğŸšœ Life as an Agritech Founder: Embracing Challenges and Opportunities

As an agritech founder, every day starts with calls from customers facing diverse challenges. Coordinating with our Cluster team, we work tirelessly to find solutions that make a difference.

Being at the helm means staying in the loop on everythingâ€”from technology utilization and machine availability to managing each farm digitally.

Over the past four years at Agrix, one key insight has emerged: the need for farm mechanization is immense. Yet, the market lacks organized players in this space. For small and marginal farmers, owning high-cost machinery is often not feasible.

We believe itâ€™s time to bridge this gap and empower every farmer with the tools they need to thrive. ğŸŒ±

Letâ€™s continue to innovate and support the backbone of our economyâ€”our farmers!

Weâ€™re happy to welcome Anshika Verma as "ğ˜ˆğ˜´ğ˜´ğ˜ªğ˜´ğ˜µğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜µ ğ˜›ğ˜³ğ˜¢ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¦ğ˜¦" to Agrix . Wishing her all the best for this new journeyâ€”looking forward to growing and achieving great things together! ğŸš€

ğŸšœ Revolutionizing Agriculture with Advanced MechanizationğŸŒ¾

We are excited to introduce the first tractor in the Agrix cluster, boasting over 65 HP and featuring a four-wheel drive, specifically designed to enhance agricultural mechanization for farmers in Bihar.

The performance of this machine is exceptional, offering unparalleled quality of service. It seamlessly supports various attachments, making it ideal for:

---> Cultivation
---> Ladger Levelling
---> Super Seeding
---> Straw Baling
- --> Straw Reaping
----> Harvesting Operations

This high-power tractor is a game-changer for Indian agriculture, allowing for perfect utilization of its capabilities.

Importantly, farmers can access this advanced machinery without the burden of high upfront costs, as it is available on a pay-per-use basis.

Together, we are paving the way for a more efficient and productive agricultural landscape. Letâ€™s empower our farmers with the tools they need to thrive!

Field preparation is not just a routine task, but a crucial step in paddy cultivation. A well-prepared field, with properly levelled, de-weeded, and aerated soil, is the foundation for uniform seed germination and efficient water management, leading to higher crop yields. This is where Agrix's field preparation machines come into play.
Agrix recognizes the value of precision agriculture and the role that mechanization plays in improving productivity and sustainability. Our advanced field preparation machines are specifically engineered to address the unique requirements of paddy-growing regions:

Efficient Land Leveling â€“ ensures even water distribution and reduces wastage
Reduced Labor Dependency â€“ mechanized tillage minimizes human effort and speeds up the process
Enhanced Soil Health â€“ improves soil structure and facilitates better root penetration
Faster Turnaround Time â€“ saves time during critical pre-sowing periods

ğ˜‰ğ˜º ğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜¨ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¨ ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¤ğ˜©ğ˜¯ğ˜°ğ˜­ğ˜°ğ˜¨ğ˜º ğ˜¸ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜© ğ˜µğ˜³ğ˜¢ğ˜¥ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜¢ğ˜¨ğ˜³ğ˜ªğ˜¤ğ˜¶ğ˜­ğ˜µğ˜¶ğ˜³ğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜¸ğ˜ªğ˜´ğ˜¥ğ˜°ğ˜®, ğ˜ˆğ˜¨ğ˜³ğ˜ªğ˜¹ ğ˜¯ğ˜°ğ˜µ ğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜­ğ˜º ğ˜±ğ˜³ğ˜°ğ˜·ğ˜ªğ˜¥ğ˜¦ğ˜´ ğ˜µğ˜°ğ˜°ğ˜­ğ˜´ ğ˜£ğ˜¶ğ˜µ ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜´ğ˜° ğ˜¦ğ˜®ğ˜±ğ˜°ğ˜¸ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜´ ğ˜§ğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜´ ğ˜µğ˜° ğ˜®ğ˜¢ğ˜¬ğ˜¦ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜§ğ˜°ğ˜³ğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜¥ ğ˜¥ğ˜¦ğ˜¤ğ˜ªğ˜´ğ˜ªğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜´, ğ˜°ğ˜±ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜®ğ˜ªğ˜»ğ˜¦ ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜´ğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜³ğ˜¤ğ˜¦ğ˜´, ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜¦ğ˜¯ğ˜©ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¤ğ˜¦ ğ˜±ğ˜³ğ˜°ğ˜§ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜¢ğ˜£ğ˜ªğ˜­ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜º.

Agrix Expands Its Reach: New Cluster Launched in Sishma, Lakhisarai, Bihar ğŸŒ¾

We are pleased to announce the successful inauguration of a new Agrix cluster in Village Sishma, District Lakhisarai, Bihar. This strategic expansion aims to strengthen agricultural infrastructure at the grassroots level, ensuring that farmers have timely access to advanced machinery, certified seeds, fertilizers, and soil testing services â€” all within their local ecosystem.
Agrix believes that sustainable agricultural development begins with empowerment at the village level. Through this cluster, we are fostering localized solutions, enhanced productivity, and rural self-reliance.
We are committed to transforming agriculture into a more technologically driven, efficient, and inclusive sector.
